description: Group odd numbers into (1), (3,5,7), (9,11,13,15,17),...; a(n) = product of n-th group.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,100
prog: (PARI) { for (n=1, 100, b=2*n^2 - 4*n + 3; write("b062031.txt", n, " ", prod(k=0, 2*n - 2, b + 2*k)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 30 2009]
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 02 2001
